short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speak the Text provided in input field

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Simple text reader that takes text as input and speak in language selected from the dropdown.You can pause the speech by clicking on pause button and resume by clicking back on play button.
